GSD.description:
mmc: jz4740: Apply DMA engine limits to maximum segment size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 7923f95997a79cef2ad161a2facae64c25a0bca0. For more details please see the references link.
